alert.note: Alert for Greene; Marengo; Sumter (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 26 at 8:20PM CST until January 30 at 12:00AM CST by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Alabama... Tombigbee River At Bevill Lock and Dam affecting Pickens, Greene and Sumter Counties. Tombigbee River At Gainesville Lock and Dam affecting Marengo, Greene and Sumter Counties. Tombigbee River At Demopolis Lock and Dam affecting Marengo, Greene, Hale and Sumter Counties. .Flooding continues on the Tombigbee River and flood warnings remain in effect. The next statement will be issued Saturday morning, or sooner if conditions warrant. && ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM MONDAY MORNING TO EARLY TUESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Tombigbee River at Gainesville Lock and Dam. * WHEN...From Monday morning to early Tuesday morning. * IMPACTS...At 101.0 feet, Flooding of low lying agricultural and wooded lands in the area occurs. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:00 PM CST Friday the stage was 94.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 101.0 feet Monday morning. It will then fall below flood stage early Monday afternoon. - Flood stage is 101.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
